"Deeg Meat":
"This time, I have a private request that's not at
all related to my work in the galley. You see,
I want to make a dragorii meat stew for my
friend's birthday. They say dragorii meat has
longevity-enhancing properties. And the thick,
meaty tail of a Deeg is so tender and not too fatty
when you stew it. Ooh, just thinking about it
makes my mouth water. Would you bring me
back some Deeg meat, please?
*Target: Deegs level 24 or higher"

"今日は厨房のお仕事とは関係ない
プライベートのお願いなんだけど……
友達のお誕生日のお祝いに
龍肉の煮物を食べさせてあげたいの。
龍族の肉には長寿の効能があるって言うし。
ディッグの肉厚なしっぽを煮込むと
余分な脂がほどよく抜けてプリップリの
食感を楽しめるのよねぇ～。
ディッグのお肉、お願いできない？
※Lv.24～のディッグが対象"
